text: Hang Massive is a world music and ambient music duo consisting of Danny Cudd and Markus Offbeat that play the Hang, a new-age percussion instrument. ==Music career== Bath in 2011 Danny Cudd and Markus “Offbeat" Johansson met in 2010 in India and formed Hang Massive soon after. They were one of the first acts to become known for playing the Hang, and quickly gained followers for their music videos, becoming "the epitome of the Hang".Olga Wanner (25 June 2016): Hang Massive und ihr magisches Instrument, Kieler Nachrichten The duo released its original composition "Once Again" on YouTube in 2011, garnering more than 47 million views as of 2020. Hang Massive released two live albums and a studio album, Distant Light, in 2016.Культовая группа Hang Massive выступит сегодня в Таллинне, Sputnik News The duo has toured in Europe, Russia and Australia.Šv. Kotrynos bažnyčioje klausytojus žavėjo duetas „Hang Massive“, Delfi Their compositions are both exclusively for the Hang, as well as collaborations with other musicians and vocalists.Sankhayan Ghosh (13 August 2017): Hang out with Hang Massive, Livemint == Discography == *Beats for your feet (2012) *As it is (2013) *Once Again (2013) *Marine Migration ft Victoria Grebezs (2015) *Distant Light (2016) *Celestial Colour (2017) *Luminous Emptiness (2018) ==References== ==External links== * *, 2011 live recording, via official YouTube channel Category:Living people Category:New- age musicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Hang Massive
